solution_line_template: After Greg lent her ${initial_debt}, Tessa paid him back {initial_debt} / {paid_back_divisor} =$<<{initial_debt}/{paid_back_divisor}={amount_paid_back}>>{amount_paid_back}.
Finally, she asked for ${additional_loan} more, leaving the debt at {debt_after_payment} + {additional_loan} = $<<{debt_after_payment}+{additional_loan}={final_debt}>>{final_debt}.
